\w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w two|strong="H8147"\w* wives, Ahinoam \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Jezreel \w and|strong="H1732"\w* Abigail \w the|strong="H1732"\w* widow \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Carmel, \w had|strong="H1732"\w* been \w taken|strong="H7617"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*.

David Destroys the Amalekites

\w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Abiathar \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimelech, “\w Bring|strong="H5066"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* ephod.” \w So|strong="H5066"\w* Abiathar \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w raiders|strong="H1416"\w*? \w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H7291"\w*?” “\w Pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H7291"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H7291"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* captives.”

\w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* men \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H5158"\w* \w Besor|strong="H1308"\w*, where \w some|strong="H3498"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w* \w behind|strong="H3498"\w*

because \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* men \w were|strong="H1732"\w* too \w exhausted|strong="H6296"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*. \w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* men \w continued|strong="H5674"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w They|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*—

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w asked|strong="H2470"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w To|strong="H3117"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w do|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* belong, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w where|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H2470"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w Amalekite|strong="H6003"\w*. \w My|strong="H1732"\w* master \w abandoned|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H5800"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w ago|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w fell|strong="H2470"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w*. \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w*, \w except|strong="H3588"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w two|strong="H3427"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* too \w exhausted|strong="H6296"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w Brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Besor|strong="H1308"\w*, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7122"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*. \w As|strong="H3318"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w greeted|strong="H7592"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w worthless|strong="H1100"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w share|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w plunder|strong="H7998"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w recovered|strong="H5337"\w*, \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*’s wife \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, “\w My|strong="H8104"\w* brothers, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*. \w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w protected|strong="H8104"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w raiders|strong="H1416"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*.
